content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i had stepped outside on our 3-season room to smoke a cigarette, when i noticed a light crossing the sky from left to right. when the light passed behind a group of trees, i waited for it to emerge from the other side, but it never did. i then noticed a very large glowing light that would flash atop a big tree in my back yard. it then fell like a leaf a few feet further down the tree and continued to glow, flash and change colors, including a red and a blue-green. it then went dark and flashed 50 feet over to the the right, went dark, reappeared and changed directions and then hovered by a tree in my neigbors yard for a few seconds. it then reappeared again several hundred feet over to the left and back in my yard before it disappeared. i felt so bewildered that when i finally went to bed, i couldn't fall asleep. i went back out to the patio around an hour later and after several minutes saw a larger(but still small) diamondish shaped object crossing the sky about 75-100 yards away, while pulsating/fluttering brilliant lights that were changing from red, to white to blue-green. i observered it in this solid form for at least 90 seconds before it disappeared into the night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange object with  lights hovering, darting, glowing, pulsating

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a strange object travelling very swiftly from the south to the north, passing below ursa major toward auriga (to the right of capella) in the north at approximately 11:50 p.M. on saturday, may 26, from edmonton, alberta, canada? very strange indeed... i was outside putting my bedding plants into my shed for the night (heard there might be some frost tonight) when something caught my eye (i always look up especially on a beautifully clear and pleasant night like tonight as i am an astronomer).  i noticed a strange red ball like object moving rather swiftly, from where i first noticed the object slightly west of zenith moving to the north to the right of capella as seen from my backyard in edmonton, alberta, in the castledowns area. it moved faster than a satellite but in a similar way, made no noise, did not get brighter as it moved toward the north, definitely not a bird (more like an aircraft but no audible sound was heard), did not look like a meteor (magnitude maybe around 0 to -1 but very diffuse as i had to strain to try and make out any shape).  just looked really stange and very different over any other aerial phenomenon that i have seen in my life. it could have been a meteor but it would be the first time that i have seen a semi-bright meteor like this as it did not flare, did not have any ionization trail or any fragmentation.  to me it looked like some diffusely defined object moving rather quickly (faster than a earth orbiting satellite and even a jet aircraft but slower than some of the slower fireballs that i have seen).  maintained a true course to the north with no deviations in its flight path.

just wanted to see if anyone else may have seen anything tonight since this is something that i have not seen before. wish i had my 11x80 binoculars with me but it just moved too swiftly for me to even think about getting them. maybe lasted a whole 10 seconds to go from near zenith (slightly west of zenith when first seen) to the north when i lost sight of it over my neighbours house.  really strange.
content.summary: Strange moving object seen for about 10 seconds  before disappearing over neighbours house

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:25 p.M. driving east directly into the setting, cresent moon, on route 45 south almost to the route 166 junction,  when we noticed the top of the trees on the south side of the highway up ahead looked on fire. at that time a triangle shaped craft came slowly toward our vehicle and passed directly over our heads just over the tree tops. we pulled the car to the side of the road and watched and listened as the craft slowly came toward us, then slightly proceded north east direction.  there was no noise, and i felt fear at being   too close proximity to the craft from our vehicle.  most fantastic color of orange we had ever witnessed along with deep blue rim of a triangle with a circle of red lights on the under side. the craft seemed like a it had depth, or sides but the amazing glowing orange was something i will never forget   craft was one mile north of junction 166/45 when first sited.  this area is old strip mine lakes and pits.  very uninhabited area. many active strip mines in operation around this area at this time.  galatia illinois, equality illinois, harrisburg illinois  strip coal mines in the path of the north east direction of the craft.
content.summary: Glowing deep orange iwth  indigo  triangle outline with lights and circle within triangle made of red lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in a field with my boyfriend and his family at night (fireworks were going to start in like 20 min) i looked at the sky and saw a fireball going accross the sky. it lasted a long time. they saw it, but no one else in the field did. i first thought it was a meteor but most times they dont last longer than 20 seconds. it lasted between 20 and 30 seconds. no tail behind it. it soon went out of sight.
content.summary: Looked like a meteor but lasted too long to be a meteor.

content.detailedDescription:
Update case # 38516
observed same satellite tonight / on schedule 9:38 pm central
south to north path
must be satellite
i consider case closed - this still does not explain my previous sighting of four similar objects at 4:30 am. they were not in formation and not following the exact same path.
content.summary: Update case# 38516 must be satellite / space station reappeared on schedule

content.detailedDescription: I knowisted a large bright ball heading over the house tonight while looking out the front door. my husband and i walked out to watch it as it came over us. it made no sound and looked like a giant fire ball.  it was flying in a straight line at a moderate to slow speed.  it was above the tree tops and appeared to be flying lower than a small air craft would fly.
content.summary: I knowisted a large bright ball heading over the house tonight while looking out the front door. my husband and i walked out to watch it as it came over us, making no sound and looked like giant a fire ball.

content.detailedDescription: I knowisted a large bright ball heading over the house tonight while looking out the front door. my husband and i walked out to watch it as it came over us. it made no sound and looked like a giant fire ball.  it was flying in a straight line at a moderate to slow speed.  it was above the tree tops and appeared to be flying lower than a small air craft would fly.

content.summary: I knowisted a large bright ball heading over the house tonight while looking out the front door. my husband and i walked out to watch it as it came over us, making no sound and looked like giant a fire ball.

content.detailedDescription: This event took place about 4 or 5 times around 7pm. no sound. straight line from east to west about 5,000 ft above ground. on one occasion the ufo was intercepted by an f4 phantom jet from the ramey airforce base from aguadilla, pr.
content.summary: First time i saw ufos looking up at sky. then i saw the ufos it was via telescopes after that first time.

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed 2 white lights, side by side, blinking in sync with strong, bright, rhythmic flashes.  there were no a/c in the area.  it appeared 200-300 feet above the hill next to candlestick park (witnessed while driving north on route 101).  there is a radio tower i used as reference for color, height, etc - and this was clearly not another tower of such.  the lights were larger and brighter than the lights on the radio tower.  while observing the lights (and trying to figure out what they were) they vanished from the sky.  no craft was observed.  the lights just shut off and the sky was empty.  the total time period was about 30 seconds.
content.summary: 2 white lights, blinking rhythmically, not an a/c or tower.

content.detailedDescription: I was going camping out at my family's pond. i had gathered some wood to use for a fire and was carrying it across the dam. about 200ft to the side of the pond is a tree row, with no noise and no previous visuals there were 3 very large extremely bright lights that suddenly appeared directly behind the trees. the lights were about 15 feet off the ground and appeared to be coming from one large object, but due to the brightness of the lights i could not make out the shape of the object other than it was a large dark mass. i could not look directly at them for any period due to the brightness. looking behind me i could see the lights were illuminating a very large area of the field. i was somewhat transfixed trying to figure out what they could be and stood there for a good minute trying to figure out what they were. suddenly it dawned on me that there was no noise, and these lights were different then anything i had ever saw and i became frightened. i threw down my firewood and turned to run back across the dam and across the field to the house. i found it extremely difficult to move, it was as though the harder i tried to run, the slower i could move, like something was holding me back. finally i made it across the dam and into the field, the light illuminating the field suddenly dimmed and it became very windy, however there was no sound, then the light totally diminished, it became calm, and i found it very easy to run finally the rest of the way to the house. what happened after i turned away from the lights to run, i do not know as i never looked back at them as after feeling like something was holding me back preventing me from running i was in fear for my life and did not want to look back, i was too concerned with just getting away from it and to the house. the whole ordeal i thought had only lasted a couple minutes, but upon returning to the house i realized from the time i had left with the firewood to the time i was able to make it to the house over an hour had passed and it only takes 5 minutes to make it to the pond from the house. i have never figured out how there could have possibly been an hours worth of time gone. this happened back in the summer of 1994, and i don't talk about it, but i can still see the whole thing in my mind like it was happening, and to this day i am convinced something was trying to immobilize me from moving to run away from the lights.
content.summary: Saw very large, very bright lights appear behind trees. no noise from object.

content.detailedDescription: Well at first i was actually filming the upcoming thunderstorm but then i saw something rather strange, something that shouldn't be there at the moment. those objects were too big and bright to be just ordinary birds and they were flying too close to each other to be identified as planes so obviously the first thing i thought of was extraterrestrial spaceships and the of course came the cursing and excitement and jumping up and down so the video became a bit sketchy for a while. and strangely, i don't remember how those objects disappeared. there's nothing else much to tell rather than see so, enjoy.
content.summary: Two starlike objects(max 500m distance between both) flies in almost straight line few minutes before the rain starts to pour.

content.detailedDescription: Looking out over the ocean i saw a red and orange pulsating ball that looked like fire.  it was traveling fast across the sky and moving up and away unlike a meteor would travel.  it looked very different from a plane in color and size.  suddenly the light turned out after viewing for about 30 sec.
content.summary: Larger than planes and stars in area.  fireball traveled fast across the sky moving up and away.  then disappeared in mid air.

content.detailedDescription:
I stayed overnight in the holiday inn express in downtown columbus, one of the upper floors.  i was watching out the window to the south, overlooking rich st. when i observed two objects further south slowly descending, not much higher in altitude than the floor i was on.  at first i thought it was a parachuter descending, but i quickly realized that the upper object and the lower object were about the same size as each other.  also, the objects were descending at a very slow rate, much slower than a parachuter would.  i live near an airport and frequently watch parachuters float down and so i am quite familiar with what that would look like.  the objects appeared to be connected to each other by a rope or other cord of sorts though i couldn't see the cord.  i was led to believe this because the distance between the objects was always the same, i later estimated the distance to be around 10 feet.  the objects were both black, and if they were painted then it would have been gloss black because at times the sun would glint off a surface on the objects.  they appeared to be round or circular one one dimension and somewhat flat on the other, so the shape was something like that of a tire.  in fact, i believe the size of each object to have been about the size of a large tire, possibly a little bigger.
  the objects continued to descend lower, and it finally occurred to me that they were closer than i originally thought when they began to descend below tree-level.  i could see that they were in front of some houses/buildings that were on the south side of the i-70/i-71 freeway, yet they were falling behind some 2-3 story buildings that are on the north side of e. engler st. between washington and grant ave.  at this point, i could vaguely discern what appeared to be a pole, but more likely a rope connecting the objects, and a rigid pole extending above the upper object by 5-10 feet.  gradually, the object descended below my line of vision, and i had written it off as a balloon or other object.  a few minutes later, the same objects rose above the treetops about two blocks to the west, near a church.  they ascended somewhat fast, faster than a balloon would but definitely not like a rocket.  the ascent was somewhat steady, at times it appeared the lower object was swinging around below the upper object but from what i could tell it was not in reaction to sudden movements by the upper object.  the objects rose to between 1000 an 2000 feet above the ground and from that point on, the altitude didn't appear to change much.  mostly the objects stayed in one area, moving horizontally somewhat.  i could see the clouds being blown by the wind (not very fast) to the southeast, but the object was not being moved by the wind  i observed it in this position for 5-10 minutes and then it started moving to the north.  it finally passed beyond my range of vision, limited by a sill from the floor above me.  it would have passed just to the west of the hotel moving northbound.  approximately 20 minutes later i went outside, but i couldn't find the objects in the sky anywhere.
  during the time the objects were observed, i witnessed three helicopters and several small and large airplanes fly by, and the objects bore no resemblance to any aircraft whatsoever.  i wondered if they were balloons of some sort, but had that been the case, the wind would have blown them to the southeast (they went the opposite direction).  there was no apparent means of propulsion or lift that i am familiar with.  at the time, the skies were cloudy and though it was quite warm outside, the potential for thermal activity that might explain the lift was low.  winds were light, i could see branches moving on a tree about one block to the south, but only if i looked very closely.
  later i walked to the area where i observed the objects descend, there was no evidence that the objects were ever there that i could see.  i took note of the size of trees, buildings, a pole, and other objects and later looked out the same hotel window at those objects to get some perspective on size, and this is how i reasoned the size of the unidentified objects.  i did not attempt to take photos or video of the objects because i was quite certain that it would not appear in the photos due to the size/distance of the objects.  i heard no sound, nor did i observe any unusual phenomena associated with the objects.
content.summary: Two black objects near downtown columbus

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i live about 20 miles north from where the sweet spot was for the annular eclipse. my family and friends had actually been at the sweet spot watching the eclipse and we were returning home for the night. we were about to go into the house when i saw a bright orange light in the sky toward the side of our house, so i walked over to investigate. when i got to the side yard i saw that there were many of these orange orbs, all appeared solid and were flying low to the ground, barely above the trees, however they didn't make a sound! they were moving from south to north. i like to think they were flying from the sweet spot too. :)

i quickly started calling my family and friends over to witness this, and my friends started taking pictures and video. the orbs were in groups of three and four, no pattern, and they faded and disappeared right above my house. we could see others coming from the south as the ones nearest us were fading and disappearing. we saw at least twelve orbs, and i was able to take pictures with my cell phone. usually my cell phone doesn't take very good pictures, but i was pretty impressed with the pictures it took that night! i wish my phone could've taken video. part of why i've waited so many days to report this sighting was so that i could include my friends videos and pictures, but they live out of state and left the next day, so i've decided not to wait for their pics and vids, and just report this sighting with my pics. 

it was incredible to see these orbs, and now i can't stop looking at that part of the sky hoping to see more. 

the lights appeared to be orbs when seen with the naked eye, but in the pictures i've included they seem to be different shapes. in the picture with three objects, you can see one fading and the two that were right behind it are brighter but they also faded and disappeared when they got to the same spot in the sky.
content.summary: Several orange orbs flying low in sky then disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing multi colored stationary lights for at least a month - what i thought were stars - very pretty- even searched online for stars emitting colors with no luck- so i was out looking for where these where when a craft witch at first i thought was a plane, but noticed as it got closer it had four very bright white lights in a diamond shape and there was no sound so i continued to watch and as it got closer, many more colored lights in a cicular outline in with the four bright lights where then coming into view- thought about snapping pic with my phone but the moon doesn't even show up on that- i watched it slowly veer and continue on slowly south and out of view don't know what it was even went online to aircraft lights to see if i could find anything similar with no luck...I will be out tonight again to watch the reaccuring colored stars/orbs that first got my attention...:)
content.summary: Circular with four bright wight lights in diamond shape came over trees veered and slowly and silently went out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
Several witnesses, four in our party, three in neighbors party and a few anonymous online witnesses. event happened around 11:45pm may 25th. facing east on university blvd in orlando, fl we saw three amber glowing objects hovering above the street in a triangle formation slowly moving east with a counter clockwise rotation of 10-20 degrees. estimated elevation 1500 feet. estimated size 100 feet. this lasted 60 seconds.

after relocating 1 mile south of that location, onto a highway over pass, we saw the same three lights fade in and fade out. traveling shortly behind were three more triangulated lights that appeared and disappeared, this happened for a duration of 5 minutes, objects traveled ssw at 20 knots for a distance of 1/4 mile. there were two commercial jets in landing pattern flying past objects nnw by 10 miles, there was a single engine plane headed w one mile s of us. 

we relocated closer to a lake view and a clearing. upon relocation (5 minute drive) there were now roughly 9-10 objects all within a square mile, variations in altitude from 1000 to 1500 feet. it was hard to distinguish triangulation at this time because of the quantity and movement or amber lights. a commercial airliner was n of us heading s and appeared to maintain its landing pattern and from our angle was positioned just above the group of objects. the objects trajectory was a steady, but semi variable, upward motion gaining altitude for a period of 90 seconds. the objects maintained a grouping of 500 feet between lights and appeared to be in a random formation. after reaching what appeared to be 10,000 feet of altitude the amber lights dissipated within a period of 10 seconds. the commercial jet at this time had already made it to the horizon line s of us and no further jet traffic was observed from the n side.

we used a canon rebel to take one photo at raw which is attached it was the best one we had of the group, you can see clearly the three lights. there were more but they didn't come across on the camera. it was my roommates camera that i borrowed quickly so i didn't know how to shoot with it.
content.summary: Three lights in triangle formation for first 5 minutes then another triangle shaped light pattern joined followed by 3-4 single lights

content.detailedDescription: 3 objects close together, then separated and followed the same path for about 10 miles then just disappeared. over satellite beach and melbourne, fl
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 objects close together, then separated and followed the same path for about 10 miles then just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were walking our dog may 26 (friday night), the whole time i was walking i just had this strange feeling (call it intuition i guess lol) so when we got back home i suggested star gazing. i pulled out the google sky maps app and started looking up a few of the stars that interested me when all of a sudden a heaviness washed over me and i looked directly at what i knew was a ufo! all i could do was point at it and say oh my god until my boyfriend looked. i was afraid if i looked away i would lose it. it was a massive dark triangle object that almost blended in with the night sky. it had three dark orange lights on each corner. it flew straight across the sky on a straight path and it was completely silent. it was unbelievable to witness
content.summary: Massive dark triangle ufo with three reddish color lights on each corner

content.detailedDescription:
Reporting on the sightings beginning may 23 2012 continuing and strengthing on until may 24 2012 11:51pm and more than likely in to may 25th. objects like army sq helicopters with triangles like side bottoms/ two sides. most notable about the two sides is that the light is not coming in at the same time on both sides and report to be at weird/quantum entanglement principles. can steadily ascend and descend quietfast or slow and have been noted as sitting in some specific spots and hovering there for periods of time. objects are not flying in fly path freeways not at correct hours of operation,  sound emission is higher speeds than normal unless literally we got a gov or ours all in the sky atm. --> so if not that than, continue...

specific constant fly overs frequently in specific areas by crafts that porject light at more than one type of (unknown to humans) frequency like state for their lights. with circle in pattern than emit a change light light than continue or if turning or communicating or getting in the way of communication have reported added light light change. 

objects have crossed at spontaneous velocity with differential distances.

objects have moved some type of other notable sighting that appears one as a normal star andor planetastrieiod etc moves out of the way of the rapidly moving craft and than settled agin once it was away, like gravitational repealling but only on the event horizon of the spherical magnetic moments still interacting bc proximity etc.

objects have increase so much activity that i must share, and i do not use a computer everyday(should,butwouldrather...), i am an observer. 

i see such a large us reporting gong on tonight as well, i do not know 

however do not continuous let them see you bc i notice they will stay longer possibly watch from near than far if they have seen you. may disregard if cadswallop. 


objects not obeying laws humans can on earth with mechanics (physics) however are operating with at least some ability to use quantum mechanics to operate their activity. #intense

so many observations are going on not just the promiant ones noted***
do not panic, plan, do not freak out, observe and think

humans are amazing creatures i want us to show that we are bonded on a human level and want our planet(even tho we have hurt it bad) and we love our home on earth as living beings . my heart is to god, #hossannahhhhinthehighest. 

use view finders, looking devices, telescopes, baniculers, hd cameras to view things so that you may note there velocity intensity shape etc.

i love you to all humans i love you earth and i know we want our home here to be safe and i hope we all bond together to protect our gift of rare elements rare timing rare planet satellite model temp model etc how rare we are we must stand as one for our planet for whatever come what may. always rememebr do not panic, think observe note and react. instincts tend to have the %, do not jump to conclusions or cause raucousness.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Cigar,   Flash,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Objects moving at rapid speed with fast changes in speed, direction, altitude, sound emission, pattern of lights. cross paths strong energy harnessed in whatever is able to do those maneuvers, #usualskyobserver

content.detailedDescription: Was just out "starwatching" off the back deck late at night. i believe this happened in april, but it could have been early may. hadn't seen anything interesting when suddenly a golden/ yellowish sphere like object, passed across my field of vision, i guess you would say from my right to left, south to north. i was looking in the perfect direction to see it. i can  only see a portion of the sky from my deck(due to the way my building faces the woods) so i only saw this thing travel across the sky for about 2 seconds or so. no sound, and no lights of any sort. to me it seemed golden or kind of yellow sphere or egg shaped.  soon afterwards i was asking myself if this could have been a bird, which gives you an idea of how low the object was to the ground and treetops. to me it looked like the object was about 100-200 feet above the trees. before this event i had been wondering, what if someone yelled "hello!" at a nearby ufo/spaceship. i can tell you right as this ball like object was about to head over the trees and out of my sight, i was thinking to myself, "should i yell at it?" hell no i was too scared. and before i could finish the thought it was gone. haven't seen that again. kinda wish it zig zagged a little because that would have really freaked me out and added something to the story, but it seemed to be traveling straight, headed who knows where.
content.summary: Low flying sphere, no lights shot across the sky, close. seemed golden or yellowish.

content.detailedDescription:
Was looking for shooting stars.
observed fast moving 'satellite'.
travelled from south to north.
9:35 pm 5/25/2012 central time
content.summary: Fast travelling satellite.

content.detailedDescription: They were practicing a cone like formation, taking turns landing and beaming stray cats. none of the beamed cats were returned and electrical devices and systems were not functioning and it seemed like gravity was really light weight. they had multicolor lights and beam systems that were able to lift objects. they also took a few shopping carts and a hardees meal.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Alien ship formation

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside around 9:00 p.M. central time visiting with a neighbor.  the neighbor spotted something in the sky and asked my opinion about what the object was.  i looked up and told her that i didn't know.  after discussing it we agreed that it was not an airplane.  we witnessed only a singular orange light (perfectly round) moving faster than what we would have thought an airplane would have traveled.  the light looked bigger than what an airplane light would look like.  we watched it for about a minute or two and then the light started to get dimmer and then disappeared all together. the light traveled across the sky, at a pretty good pace, in a straight line. we were pretty stumped as to what it was and then started wondering if we had just witnessed a ufo!
content.summary: Outside at night-observed glowing orange light larger than star, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking around in my woods behind my house when randomly, this thing just comes by and hovers for about 15 mins or so.While it was hovering in mid air, it had white and gold lights flashing, it was like it was looking for something.After a few mins of looking,ot just zoomed off.
content.summary: Very creepy, dont know if contained alien life forms or not.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working the night shift at williams island, an exclusive wealthy residential area in florida, as a security employee on the night of november 1999 when i had decided, as was usual at that time, to take a break from typing on a manuscript i was working on at 3 a.M. or thereabout. i stepped outside for air, walked a dozen steps or less from my station, and felt something diagonally above me that caused me to look up. to my utmost surprise above me at 100 feet was a humongous black and extremely heavy-looking triangular object without lights hovering near a building to my right near the 10th floor, soundlessly, in mid-air. i looked at the underbelly of the craft and what appeared to be rivets or some design around its edges, and thought it was so near one could actually hit it with a rock if they tried. i was awestrucked at the huge size of that thing, and at the incredible weight of what i thought to be a huge ship. when i realized the heavy craft was suspended in mid-air, navigating near a window of that building without sound, i took off toward my station frightened, locking the door when i got inside, and peeking up at it through the window of the guardhouse, when it slowly turned in a southwest direction. 

i never told anyone about it until recently. only three people now know. i don't want to be contacted nor do i want to pursue this further. i had watched for years the ridiculous questioning of whether ufos exist or not, and had heard their arguements for or against it. all i can say to all of you at mufon is you are on the right track. don't give up.
content.summary: Heavy-looking, very huge triangular black object soundlessly hovering above me with no lights near 10th story window.

content.detailedDescription:

content.detailedDescription: I was sat in the park with friend when we noticed 'moving stars' 10-20 of these were visible in the time we were there i called a non emergency police team who were confused and had no idea what the objects were the star like objects hovered and then quickly moved to another llocation and sometimes back again there were bright flashes in the sky too
content.summary: Small star like object flying around

content.detailedDescription: While hiking in the north cacades i and 3 others went to baker lake of of the mt.Baker highway.  we walked to just before the gate on the road thar goes over the dam and turned to the east to look at the lower lake and photograph it.  this is one of those photos.  this object did not show up in my photos.  it is a photo taken by one of my group.  he took several shots all within seconds of each other and the object is not in any of the other photos.  none of us saw the object with the naked eye.  we first saw it in the photo.
content.summary: Suspected ufo photographed by mt.Baker wa

content.detailedDescription: It was late eveing and there was a load noise coming from outside and everybody looking out of there windows it was a big helicopter circling around looking for something could not see the type of craft but i think it was military so i go back in the house to get my night vision bie to see if i could see if it was a police or military copter it was big and losd at that time i was looking at the helicopter i see 3 or 4 objects about 2 to 5 miles away going west 3 objects were moving and one behind it going up and down but you could not see it with your naked eyes only with the night vision and i thought strange the helicopter was looking for something to kept moving around in circles over heilbronn the objects were over by wartenberg mountiana few miles away about 1200 to 5000 feet this went on for about over a half an hour with the strange helicopter flying around the lights that i saw were going west torwards stuttgart.You could not see these objects with your eyes the first 3 objects were above each other and 1 behind them and were moving up and down too!.They wernt stars that i now for sure!!!!..The copter i think was black no lights:oh there was another strange thing about the lights too there were these beams of light that were like search lights that were shooting up into the sky a few of them right around the strange lights but agian you could not see the lights with your naked eyes only with night vision!.Real weird don,t know if the lights were coming from the objects or search lights....By the way i look for ufos all the time.I,ve seen many ufos in my life and was maybe abducted in the 70s.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 3 to 4 glowing objects in sky
